title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.20 - Fidelity bond coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.20 - Fidelity bond coverage

State Regulations

Adequate fidelity bond coverage for fraudulent or dishonest
acts of State officers and State employees should be provided for such officers
and employees who are accountable for money or property of the State or held by
the State in trust for others. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
16.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
